comment._content: The guy sitting on the dunes makes this image fabulous. Love it.

comment._content: Nah, this has gotta be the Indiana Dunes.  Is that snow or sand?

comment.author: 29364645@N00
comment._content: these sand dune/palos images are most certainly mislabeled. a quick check to the folks at the forest preserve of cook county confirmed that these were not taken near palos.
